MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Passy
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: (Instantly, such a relationship between two people foreshadows love! When this criminal was arrested, he claimed, "I'm the best friend of the conductor of the SSS.")

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Passy
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: (The criminal he's about to interrogate is an extreme villain with numerous criminal records! He, on the other hand, is an earnest and honorable soldier, a respected apostle of love and justice!)

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Fussen
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: ...Are you crying, Passy?
Then...Over the course of several days, Passy was subjected to an "intense education" by Fussen, staying at the castle and reading from Fussen's collection of books.

The case was easily resolved.
Something tells me that there is a deeper-rooted problem going on...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Passy
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: (Indeed, when I checked, they are from the same area! They even went to the same military school...! Oh, that's the same as "lovers"!)
Recap of Episode 2. Passy, who has been asking me to interrogate a criminal, seems to have had some strange experience at Fussen's castle.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Passy
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
As expected of childhood friends, they understand each other perfectly!
And yet, the most important part of their love is not being conveyed...!
Love...? What're you talking about, Passy?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Passy
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Haha, no wonder you don't understand, Conductor.

...What's up with you, Passy?
You're acting weird.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Passy
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: S-so you're childhood friends! And apparently, the criminal has a one-sided crush...! That's good, that kind of thing is good too! I love it!

And yet, for some reason, he repeatedly commits crimes in my name, which is annoying. In other words, he is a petty scoundrel who should be despised, who is only doing bad things using others' reputations.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Passy
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Haha, it's nothing Conductor. I've been weird until now. I was narrow-minded, intolerant, and lacked understanding of love... Oh, I am ashamed of myself for being so young and immature!

We don't really. This guy is a small-time crook who often claims to be my best friend and repeatedly commits petty crimes such as trying to get free food. Apparently, he used to live in my neighborhood when I was a kid, but I never spoke to him back then.
Ahhh...this guy? I heard that he was a vicious robber who ransacked many stores, so I was a bit defensive.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Passy
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: (I'm so nervous!!)

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Passy
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Because at any given time―
Love is the most difficult concept in the world to grasp♪

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Passy
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: (Two such men face each other in a dank cell at the end of a strange fate! très bien! One is a criminal, the other is a soldier of justice who should be cracking down on criminals! The two men have such contrasting lives and positions, and now their hearts are filled with enormous emotions!)
Later... After a brief interrogation with Passy, who for some reason was very excited, the culprit quickly admitted his guilt and was formally brought to justice.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Passy
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: (Two men whose paths should never have crossed! Two people on opposite sides, destined to be enemies and destroy each other! But what if there were a connection between their pasts...?)

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Passy
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Oh, so you know each other?
Oh, how do you two know each other?
I see...I don't know, but this guy makes interrogation go a lot faster. He's a flamboyant guy who will admit his guilt and confess to anything if you give him a hard enough time.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Passy
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: (Yes! Hatred and love are two sides of the same coin! Lords and ladies who are enemies on the surface are destined never to be united! In fact, that's why they're nurturing a huge love for each other in their hearts!)

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Fussen
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: To be precise, it's a detailed depiction of the moment when the emperor is about to be assassinated by his political enemy. It is an immortal masterpiece of historical and artistic value.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Fussen
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Hmm, this is a painting of an ancient emperor, probably the most famous in your country, and his mortal enemy, who opposed him and tried to kill him many times.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Passy
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: This is...

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Fussen
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Hmm, then maybe she witnessed this scene, too.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Passy
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Yes. She's my tutor, and I respect her more than anyone. As you said, she has mastered alchemy and has become immortal, so she has a lot of experience and has actually witnessed many historical events.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Fussen
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Ah, the world-famous Great Sage. I've heard that she's the only person in history to have achieved such a profound mastery of alchemy.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Passy
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Haha, that's what Termini often says♪

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Fussen
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Hmm, but don't be ashamed of your ignorance,
for it is the true wise man who knows what he does not know.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Passy
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Yes. But these are tears of joy, Fussen. Until now, I was a baby who really didn't know anything. I never knew there was such precious love in this world.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Fussen
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: The expression of bitterness and hatred on the face of his political opponent is magnificent. The emperor had killed and trampled his entire family, and he was trapped to the point where he had no choice but to kill the emperor or commit suicide.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Fussen
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Forget about the history. Now that you have a better understanding of art and love, what fate do you imagine befell these two great men?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Passy
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Well, of course... the political rival is holding a blade to the throat of an emperor he hates with all his heart.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Fussen
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Now, I have a question for you.
After the scene in this painting, what do you think happened to these two people?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Fussen
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Perfect!!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Cinderella
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Huhhh...?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Passy
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
(Of course, Fussen!
No, my kindred spirit in a foreign land!)

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Passy
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: ―Naturally, they love each other deeply and will be happily married.
